author: leosutic
msg: Fixed a missing end tag, and replaced "Iterator" with "array" when a method
returned an array (Configuration[]) but the Javadoc was saying Iterator or

author: leosutic
msg: Some Javadoc changes. There was some confusion as to whether a
container may pass a null reference to any of the lifecycle methods.
It is now made explicit that it may not do so.

author: leosutic
msg: Some Javadoc changes - the text could be read in such a way as to mean that the
configure() method must be called *first* in the lifecycle (i.e. before enableLogging,
contextualize, and so on), which contradicts the Avalon lifecycle document.
(As well as contradicts what most containers actually *do*.)
